RestaurantDescription.Name: zz Siam Harbourside
RestaurantDescription.Description: Order online takeaway from Siam Harbourside, Bristol’s finest Thai restaurant on Hotwell road. A popular online takeaway choice with our locals Siam serves superb authentic Thai cuisine for hungry mouths.  You can have delivered a variety of Thai food including chicken, duck, beef, pork, seafood and vegetarian dishes. We highly recommend you give Siam Harbourside a try. Don't just eat takeaway, eat AMAZING takeaway through meals.co.uk.

Items.Title: 101 Siam Harbourside Mixed Starters
Items.Description:
A selection of authentic Thai starters, served with a variety of sauces.
(minimum order is for two people)

Items.Title: 102 Goong nam peung
Items.Description: King prawn deep fried in Chef’s special coconut batter, coated with honey and sesame seeds.

Items.Title: 103 Gai Satae
Items.Description: Strips of chicken marinated in Thai spices, put on sticks and served with peanut sauce and toast.

Items.Title: 104 Poh pia goong
Items.Description: Spring rolls filled with mixture of prawn, glass noodles and fresh herbs, served with sweet and sour chilli sauce.

Items.Title: 105 Poh pia phak (Vegetable spring rolls)
Items.Description: Mixed vegetables cooked with Thai spices, wrapped in spring roll pastry, served with sweet & sour chilli sauce.

Items.Title: 106 Gradoog (See krong) moo yang
Items.Description: Pork spare rib marinated in honey and fresh herbs and grilled.

Items.Title: 107 Nuea sawan
Items.Description: Very thin slices of beef marinated in honey and fresh Thai spices, fried until crispy.

Items.Title: 108 Goong satay
Items.Description: King prawn marinated in Thai spices, placed on stick and grilled, topped with peanut sauce.

Items.Title: 109 Ped nam peung
Items.Description: Crispy fried duck coated with slightly spicy honey sesame sauce, served on a bed of fresh watercress.

Items.Title: 110 Tod mun talay
Items.Description: Ground seafood fishcakes mixed with Thai spices and red curry paste, deep fried, served with cucumber and sweet chilli sauce.

Items.Title: 111 Hoy maeng poo ob
Items.Description: Fresh mussels stir fried with lemon grass, chilli, sweet basil leaves and fresh Thai herbs.

Items.Title: 112 Kanom pang na moo
Items.Description: Deep fried minced pork and chicken toasties, served with cucumber and sweet chilli sauce.

Items.Title: 113 Tung Tong
Items.Description: Crispy pastry parcels filled with succulent vegetables

Items.Title: 121 Ruam mit vegetarian
Items.Description: A selection of authentic Thai vegetarian starters, served with a variety of sauces.

Items.Title: 122 Mung savirat
Items.Description: Fresh mixed vegetables in a special batter, fried until crispy and served with peanut sauce.

Items.Title: 123 Poh pia phak
Items.Description: Mixed vegetables cooked with Thai spices, wrapped in spring roll pastry, served with sweet & sour chilli sauce.

Items.Title: 126 Tom yum hed

Items.Title: 201 Tom kah gai
Items.Description: Chicken and mushroom in an aromatic coconut milk soup, flavoured with galingale, chilli, coriander and fresh herbs.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Podge's Gourmet Burger Co
RestaurantDescription.Description: Warrenâ€™s Gourmet Burger Co on Wooton road serves the biggest and best burger experience in Bristol. The burgers here are handmade using the best ingredients they could source which only adds to the great flavour of the gourmet experience. They are also winners of Bristol Good Food Awards 2012 for their excellence in the Kitchen, so takeaway and let us deliver an award winning experience to the comfort of your own home. Please note Warren Gourmet Burger Co Bristol is not one of meals.co.uk 'partner restaurants' therefore prices may differ from their advertised ones slightly to reflect this - we are also subject to their takeaway availability at your time of ordering. Promo codes do not apply to this restaurant.
